parameters.name: Skeleton
parameters.explanation: Skeleton: do the introduction and headers give an accurate preview of the topics to be covered?

Excellent.description: Introduction and headers are well-thought-out and guide reader through the piece.

Some_issues.description: Structure is decent overall, but too few headers and/or some headers do not describe content well.

Unacceptable.description: Structure is confusing. Headers are nonexistent, poorly selected, and/or have no relationship to the content within.

parameters.name: Formatting
parameters.explanation: Is the text well-formatted with bullet points, headings, and white space to enhance readability?

Excellent.description: Text is exceptionally well-formatted for readability. Consistent use of headings, bullet points, white space, and other elements to create a clear and visually appealing structure.

Some_issues.description: Formatting is inconsistent or cluttered. Overuse or underuse of bullet points, headings, or white space, making the text somewhat difficult to read.

Unacceptable.description: Poor formatting significantly hinders readability. Lack of headings, dense paragraphs, and inconsistent use of visual elements make the text unappealing and difficult to process.

parameters.name: Flow
parameters.explanation: Flow: is there a logical flow between sentences and paragraphs?

Excellent.description: Sentences and paragraphs all flow together logically and mellifluously.

Some_issues.description: Direction of the piece is mostly clear to reader, however, there may be occasional abruptness or awkward transitions.

Unacceptable.description: Piece jumps between topics seemingly at random. Directionality of the piece is totally unclear to reader.

parameters.name: SEO
parameters.explanation: SEO: has piece been optimized for at least one identified keyword?

Excellent.description: Piece has been optimized for multiple keywords and reads naturally.

Some_issues.description: Piece has been optimized for some keywords; may read robotically.

Unacceptable.description: Piece has not been optimized for keywords.

n/a.description: Piece did not need to be optimized for search keywords for certain reasons.

parameters.name: Clarity
parameters.explanation: Clarity: are sentences and paragraphs clear and concise?

Excellent.description: Piece is clear throughout with little-to-no cruft.

Some_issues.description: Lack of clarity in some places, or instances of verbosity.

Unacceptable.description: Many sentences/paragraphs are unclear and/or overly wordy.

parameters.name: Interlinking
parameters.explanation: Interlinking: does the piece appropriately use interlinks to Daytona resources?

Excellent.description: Relevant keywords are interlinked to appropriate pages from Daytona Dotfiles and Definitions sitemaps.

Some_issues.description: Some relevant interlinking, but missing key opportunities or using irrelevant links.

Unacceptable.description: No interlinking to Daytona resources, or inappropriate use of interlinks.

parameters.name: Audience
parameters.explanation: Audience: does the piece address the intended audience?

Excellent.description: Audience is clear. Language/topics are pitched toward correct vertical, buying stage, and role.

Some_issues.description: Piece is missing some content required by audience or uses some language inappropriate for audience.

Unacceptable.description: Content does not reflect the interests of the audience whatsoever.

parameters.name: Next steps
parameters.explanation: Next steps: does the piece give the reader clear, actionable advice and/or next steps?

Excellent.description: Piece not only provides useful and actionable advice, but also provides mechanisms/CTA(s) for the user to take action right away.

Some_issues.description: Piece provides useful advice but does not make it immediately obvious to reader how they might take action.

parameters.name: Urgency
parameters.explanation: Urgency: is it clear to the reader what is at risk if they don't read the piece?

Excellent.description: Reader immediately knows within the first few paragraphs what is at risk.

Some_issues.description: Reader doesn't immediately understand the value of the piece, but does understand if they take the time to read all the way through.

Unacceptable.description: Unclear to reader what value this piece provides even after reading all the way through.

parameters.name: Purpose
parameters.explanation: Purpose: does the piece meet its intended objective?

Excellent.description: Objective is easily identifiable and content supports said objective. Piece delivers on promise of title/introduction.

Some_issues.description: Objective is not immediately clear; some additional content needed to support objective. Some disconnect between title/introduction and rest of piece.

Unacceptable.description: Objective cannot be determined. Little to no connection between title/introduction and rest of piece.

parameters.name: Daytona Context
parameters.explanation: Daytona Context: does the piece effectively incorporate Daytona-specific context?

Excellent.description: Content seamlessly integrates Daytona context, including running code samples in Daytona workspaces and showcasing relevant Daytona features such as running daytona commands in the CLI (shell) like: daytona create OR daytona code. Content is r“eferencing Daytona's use cases and benefits.

Some_issues.description: Some Daytona context is present, but not consistently or thoroughly integrated throughout the piece.

Unacceptable.description: Little to no Daytona-specific context; content could apply to any development environment.

parameters.name: Glossary Contribution
parameters.explanation: Glossary Contribution: does the piece contribute a new, relevant definition to the Daytona Definitions page?

Excellent.description: Piece contributes a clear, relevant, and well-written new definition to the Daytona Definitions page.

Some_issues.description: A new definition is provided but may need refinement in clarity or relevance.

Unacceptable.description: No new definition provided, or the provided definition is irrelevant or poorly written.

parameters.name: Hook
parameters.explanation: Hook: is there a catchy headline and excerpt to draw readers in?

Excellent.description: Title and excerpt are concise, accurate to the content of the piece, and enticing to the reader.

Some_issues.description: Title is too long, too boring, or not descriptive of the actual content.

Unacceptable.description: One or both of the title and excerpt is missing.

parameters.name: Originality
parameters.explanation: Originality: does the piece avoid cliché, overused, and generic language?

Excellent.description: Language of the piece is original and inventive while still being clear.

Some_issues.description: Some clichés; alternatively, the language may be novel but unclear. May contain mixed metaphors.

Unacceptable.description: Text contains many clichés. May even use the exact phrasing found in other pieces.

parameters.name: Credibility
parameters.explanation: Is the evidence used to support the argument(s) relevant, accurate, and trustworthy? Does it demonstrate E-E-A-T (Expertise, Experience, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness)?

Excellent.description: The argument is clearly supported by accurate, relevant, and trustworthy evidence from authoritative sources. Strong E-E-A-T signals are present.

Some_issues.description: Some details support the argument, but they are not fully elaborated upon or sufficiently specific. Some irrelevant information. Moderate E-E-A-T.

Unacceptable.description: Little to no evidence supports core arguments; many factual inaccuracies. The piece lacks credibility and trustworthiness. Low E-E-A-T.

parameters.name: Mechanics
parameters.explanation: Mechanics: are there grammar, punctuation, or spelling errors?

Excellent.description: No grammar, punctuation, or spelling errors. Impeccable.

parameters.name: Tone
parameters.explanation: Tone: is the tone of this piece in line with brand guidelines and purpose of the piece?

Excellent.description: Tone is exemplary of our brand, appropriate for the target audience, and consistent throughout.

Some_issues.description: Tone is mostly appropriate for the audience and for our brand, but with some inconsistencies.

Unacceptable.description: Tone is inappropriate for the audience and for our overall brand.
